adrFormatAddress: 218 W 18th St 6th floor, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Had a great experience using Holly as our listing agent; she had a great sense of the market, gave solid advice every step of the way. Once we had a buyer, she did an amazing job helping with the board approval, and got us closed quickly. Really can't say enough good things. She makes it look easy, which is what makes her so good, because it's not easy. Unless you use Holly!  Let her make it easy for you!

text.text: Had a great experience using Holly as our listing agent; she had a great sense of the market, gave solid advice every step of the way. She makes it look easy, which is what makes her so good, because it's not easy. Unless you use Holly!  Let her make it easy for you!

originalText.text: Holly is the absolute best. I found a good friend who is also an amazing real estate broker. She helped me rent a place 6 years ago and since then helped me purchase apartments in the city and also find tenants for me. In fact, she even connected me to her real estate broker friend in Miami who helped me buy an apartment there. She has also helped a few of my friends buy and sell their apartments. I would highly, highly recommend Holly for any real estate needs in NY. The absolute best, extremely knowledgeable and non-pushy real estate broker.

originalText.text: Holly was a fantastic resource to us as we were purchasing our first home together. She helped us understand the buying process and identify the perfect home. In a competitive market her suggestions were critical to not only finding the perfect place but actually securing it. Holly consistently went above and beyond for us, from consultation to years after closing. I’ll never forget her calling us to let us know that the offer had been accepted on our dream home! Thanks, Holly!

text.text: Holly was a fantastic resource to us as we were purchasing our first home together. She helped us understand the buying process and identify the perfect home. In a competitive market her suggestions were critical to not only finding the perfect place but actually securing it. Holly consistently went above and beyond for us, from consultation to years after closing. I’ll never forget her calling us to let us know that the offer had been accepted on our dream home! Thanks, Holly!

originalText.text:
We were referred to Holly by a friend and so we knew she would be good. Then we found out she was PHENOMENAL at managing the search, our expectations and helping us put together an all star team (lawyer, finance, etc.).
I can say that NYC is a hard place to buy a home but Holly walked us through what to expect, did a lot of research to find an incredible home and listened to what we really wanted. We now live in the house of our dreams and could not have done it without Holly - I am happy to recommend her to anyone looking for a home (and do on a consistent basis).

originalText.text: We loved working with Holly Sose.  She was incredibly professional, organized, well-informed and always helpful, and most importantly, understood us and our needs.  We worked seamlessly with Holly on the renovation and listing of our existing apartment and the purchase of a new one, and her attention to detail, depth of knowledge and execution were rock solid, and as an added bonus, she was able to provide multiple recommendations to us throughout the process, from contractors, to vendors to designers.   Holly and her team were a pleasure to work with and we have the highest regard for the work she did with us, and we recommend her to anyone looking for a great real estate experience.
